Name: maximize_team_utilization
Description: Maximize the overall utilization of team members

Name: minimize_project_duration
Description: Minimize the total duration of the project

Name: maximize_story_points_completed
Description: Maximize the total story points delivered per sprint

Name: minimize_blocker_severity
Description: Minimize the severity of active blockers

Name: maximize_team_velocity
Description: Maximize the average velocity of the team

Name: maximize_feature_priority
Description: Maximize the average priority of features in the release

Name: minimize_sprint_goal_failure
Description: Minimize the number of sprints where the goal was not achieved

Name: maximize_stakeholder_satisfaction
Description: Maximize the average satisfaction level of stakeholders

Name: minimize_task_effort
Description: Minimize the total estimated effort for all tasks

Name: maximize_budget_adherence
Description: Maximize adherence to the project budget (minimize overage)

Name: minimize_retrospective_actions
Description: Minimize the number of improvement actions needed (indicates fewer problems)
